import React from 'react' import { useLocation } from 'react-router'; const ShowTicket = ({ match }) => { console.log('match', match); const location = useLocation() return (

Invoice

Name : {location.state?.name}

Number : {location.state?.number}

Recipient

Invoice # { location?.state?.date.toString()}
Date { location?.state?.date}
Amount Due ${ (location?.state?.selectedSeats?.length)*1000}
Item Description Rate Seats Price
Bus Ticket bus ticket $1000.00 { location?.state?.selectedSeats?.length} ${ (location?.state?.selectedSeats?.length)*1000}
Total ${ (location?.state?.selectedSeats?.length)*1000}
Amount Paid ${ (location?.state?.selectedSeats?.length)*1000}
Balance Due $00.00
) } export default ShowTicket
